attributes.review: this took 4 hours to download. when it was finally done i went on the app and it crashed then every time i'd try to go back on and complain... it crashed again! then my phone randomly shut off. i turned it back on and every single one of my apps were gone except this one. weird huh? SKETCHY!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I got the app to know more about my lovely non racist, homophobic,misogynistic Cheeto of a president and I was not pleased right when I got the app it hacked all my of my devices and the it said that it will take my family if I did not vote for him and then I said no and I fell down the stairs. So I would not recommend getting this app it is nay safe for you. So just NO❤️ No❤️
attributes.title: Gen Z Rules

attributes.review: I TOTALLY had high expectations for this app but THEN it took 10 weeks to download. I was SEVERELY disappointed. THEN I opened the app I had spent so LONG waiting for and it completely crashed. Soon following I got TONS of robo calls and I am not happy, but don’t hold it against me. How can we have a stable government went you people can’t even make an app properly.

Do NOT download this app! After the 2 weeks it took to download it was nothing like I expected and once I deleted the app Oompa Loompas came in and begged me to vote for him or they wouldn’t get dinner for the night. They then proceeded to give me the WORST fake tan in the world and put a toupee on me now I look old and orange! 0/10 DONT recommend this app if you don’t want to get attacked by bunker boys minions

it took three weeks just for this app to download smh. once i opened up the app it kept crashing my phone. i had to delete and download the app AGAIN!!! i tried opening the app but it kept yelling insults at me. do not download this app!!!! i had a friend who also downloaded this app and her information got wiped!!!! again, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡✌️😗
attributes.title: 🤡trash app🤡

attributes.review: this app took 8 hours to download and once it was finally on my phone all of my other apps disappeared and i got an ungodly influx of emails from the trump administration. it was so bad that i had to trade in my phone, but it’s still happening. the app keeps trying to download itself from the app store and i keep trying to stop it, but it’s not working. deleting the app gives me a couple minutes of peace, but then it downloads itself again. i think it might be spyware or something of the sort? or some straight up demonic entity, honestly either way.
attributes.title: ruined my life

attributes.review: awful, just awful. the app wouldn’t open for the first few days and when it did open it stole all of my data and sold it to china. now they have my info and i have been hacked. i am very mad and very upset do not purchase this app. it also found my address and the workers came and kidnapped my dog and my neighbors cat😿😿
attributes.title: DONT GET IT

attributes.review: I, a woman of color, voted for trump because he seemed like a good person. Once I downloaded/opened the app, it restarting my phone. It did something crazy to my phone causing it to send random messages to people i haven’t even talked to for 2+ years. I thought someone hacked into my phone but then I kept receiving a pop up add saying “VOTE TRUMP/PENCE 2020”.
attributes.title: Broke my phone!!!

attributes.review: THIS APP!!! they hacked into my bank and when I woke up in the morning, all the money was gone! then when I got out of bed there was a huge trump 2020 sign in front of my house so i went to go look at it and it started bursting out fireworks but because i actually care about this virus, i had hand sanitizer on so the sign blew up my hand. THANKS TRUMP NOW I ONLY HAVE ONE HAND.
attributes.title: a scam

attributes.review: this app made me want to throw up. it took DAYS to download and when it finally did, i had already used the time while i was waiting educate myself and others (i was never a trumpet btw) and as soon as it finished i deleted it because it was so ugly and disgusting and it stood against blm and acab😛hate this app hate trump yeah yeah settle for biden
